title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: 1. Cook spaghetti in salted water. 2. Fry pancetta with garlic. 3. Beat eggs with Parmesan. 4. Drain pasta, mix with pancetta, then off heat stir in egg mixture. 5. Season with pepper and serve.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: 1. Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices. 2. Grill or pan-fry until cooked. 3. Saut√© onion, add tomatoes and simmer. 4. Add cream and chicken, cook for 10 minutes. 5. Garnish with cilantro.

title: Avocado Toast
summary: Fresh avocado smashed on artisan bread, topped with chili flakes and lemon.
instructions: 1. Toast bread until golden. 2. Mash avocado with lemon juice, salt, and pepper. 3. Spread on toast. 4. Drizzle with olive oil and sprinkle chili flakes.

title: Beef Burger
summary: Juicy beef patty with lettuce, tomato, cheese, and our secret sauce.
instructions: 1. Form beef into patty, season with salt and pepper. 2. Grill or pan-fry to desired doneness, add cheese on top to melt. 3. Toast bun. 4. Assemble: bottom bun, lettuce, patty, tomato, sauce, top bun.
